data.title: CBCF Leadership Institute
data.text:
Welcome!

To access your account, sign in with your Blackbaud ID (BBID). If you don’t have a Blackbaud ID, select Sign Up to create one. The sign up is a one-time process. After you have signed up, you will be able to sign in with your new Blackbaud ID.

How to Create a BBID – Existing Account

Note: When creating your BBID, be sure to enter the same email address that is on your Academic Works account. If you enter a different email address it will not link to your existing account. If you are unsure what email is in use for your account, please contact your organization directly before creating your BBID. If you received an invitation email, please use the link in the email and be sure to use the same email address as the invitation email.

LOG-IN PAGE

Applicants and Administrators

Welcome!

To access your account, sign in with your Blackbaud ID (BBID). If you don’t have a Blackbaud ID, select Sign Up to create one. The sign up is a one-time process. After you have signed up, you will be able to sign in with your new Blackbaud ID.

If you need to recover your password or you have not yet received an email confirming your account, see trouble signing in.

“CONTINUE with BLACKBAUD ID”

If you do not yet have a BBID and your email address is not a Gmail or Apple email, click the Sign Up link in Need an account? Sign up.

PASSWORD must contain at least 12 characters and 3 of the following:

– Capital letter

– Lowercase letter

– Number

– Special character (!, #, %, etc.)

Click “Sign Up” after confirming password

If you need to recover your password or you have not yet received an email confirming your account, see trouble signing in.

Welcome!

To access your Reference or Reviewer account, sign in with your Blackbaud ID (BBID) using the email address where you received your invitation.

If you don’t have a Blackbaud ID, select Sign Up to create one. The sign up is a one-time process. Once you have signed up, you will be able to sign in with your new Blackbaud ID.

If you need to recover your password or you have not yet received an email confirming your account, see trouble signing in.

How to Create a BBID – Existing Account

Note: When creating your BBID, be sure to enter the same email address that is on your Academic Works account. If you enter a different email address it will not link to your existing account. If you are unsure what email is in use for your account, please contact your organization directly before creating your BBID. If you received an invitation email, please use the link in the email and be sure to use the same email address as the invitation email.

LOG-IN PAGE

References and Reviewers

Welcome!

To access your account, sign in with your Blackbaud ID (BBID). If you don’t have a Blackbaud ID, select Sign Up to create one. The sign up is a one-time process. After you have signed up, you will be able to sign in with your new Blackbaud ID.

If you need to recover your password or you have not yet received an email confirming your account, see trouble signing in.

“CONTINUE with BLACKBAUD ID”

If you do not yet have a BBID and your email address is not a Gmail or Apple email, click the Sign Up link in Need an account? Sign up.

PASSWORD must contain at least 12 characters and 3 of the following:

– Capital letter

– Lowercase letter

– Number

– Special character (!, #, %, etc.)

Click “Sign Up” after confirming password
